entry.title: Thursday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then near blizzard. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Near blizzard. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
